name: 寂寞之声
author: 王珺
lyric:
[ti:寂寞之声]
[ar:王珺]
[00:05.539]嗨，黑夜，我的老友
[00:14.526]又来和你谈天了
[00:16.917]因为有一梦境悄悄地
[00:19.963]留下种子在我梦中
[00:22.198]这幻象深植在我的脑海里
[00:27.479]始终回旋
[00:29.103]於沉默的声音中
[00:31.591]独自走在无止尽的梦里
[00:34.791]狭窄的鹅卵石街道
[00:37.689]在街灯的光晕下
[00:40.332]翻起衣领迎向寒冷湿气
[00:44.243]我的双眼感到刺痛因霓虹灯的闪烁
[00:49.71]那撕裂了黑夜
[00:50.950]并触动了沉默的声音
[00:53.489]在赤裸的光线下我看到
[00:56.485]成千上万的人，或许有更多
[01:00.501]人们说话但不是交谈
[01:03.191]人们听得见却不倾听
[01:06.191]人们写歌，总不是分享理念的歌
[01:10.811]没有人敢打破沉默的声音
[01:15.535]「傻瓜！」我说道：「你不知道
[01:19.545]沉默是会像癌细胞扩散的；
[01:22.897]听取我教你的言语，
[01:25.639]抓住我拉你的臂膀。」
[01:28.635]但我说的话就像是无声的雨滴
[01:33.02]落入沉默的井里发出回音
[01:37.725]这些人又鞠躬又祈祷的
[01:40.568]对著他们所制造的霓虹上帝膜拜
[01:46.507]招牌上打出闪烁的警语
[01:49.708]在这些字句中成形
[01:52.348]招牌上写著：
[01:54.430]先知的预言就写在
[01:56.666]地下道的墙上
[01:58.392]或是廉价公寓的门廊里。」
[02:02.253]并且在沉默的声音中低语呢喃

name: 寂静之声
author: 张毅,王珺
lyric:
[00:00.13]歌曲：寂静之声
[00:03.57]歌手：群星
[00:05.57]专辑：十二女声Ⅱ
[00:15.43]
[00:18.26]Hello darkness my old friend
[00:22.46]love come to talk with you again
[00:26.89]Because a vision softly creeping
[00:31.95]left its seeds while I was sleeping
[00:36.80]And the vision
[00:39.18]that was planted in my brain
[00:43.86]Still remains
[00:48.36]within the sound of silence
[00:54.47]In restless dreams I walked alone
[00:58.92]narrow streets of cobblestone
[01:03.70]Neath the halo of a street lamp
[01:08.54]I turned my collar to the cold and damp
[01:13.11]When my eyes were stabbed by the flash of a neon light
[01:24.08]That split the night and touched the sound of silence
[01:31.07]And in the naked light I saw
[01:35.66]ten thousand people maybe more
[01:40.33]People talking without speaking
[01:44.88]people hearing without listening
[01:49.65]People writing songs
[01:52.49]that voices never share
[01:56.56]No one dare disturb the sound of silence
[02:07.72]Fools said I you do not know silence like a cancer grows
[02:16.80]Hear my words that I might teach you
[02:21.42]take my arms that I might reach you
[02:26.02]But my words like silence raindrops fell
[02:34.16]And echoed in the wells of silence
[02:44.19]And the people bowed and prayed to the neon god they made
[02:53.23]And the sign flashed out its warning
[02:58.00]in the words that it was forming
[03:01.80]And the sign said the words of the prophets are written on the subway walls
[03:09.67]And tenement halls
[03:12.67]and whispered in the sounds of silence
[03:23.31]
